name: Better Together: The Co-op Puzzle Platformer
name_original: Better Together: The Co-op Puzzle Platformer
description:
A 3D, 2-player, co-op game about solving puzzles around moving platforms.

Made with the Unreal Engine using a listen server architecture.

Supports LAN connections across multiple computers on the same network. Can be set up with VPN services like Hamachi to allow players across different networks to play together.

Instructions:

1. Each player launches the game.

2. One of the 2 players will have to be the host and then they other player will join the host's game. To become the host, use the backtick key ( ` ) to open the UE console and type "Host". Hit enter.

3. To join a game open the UE console and type "Join" followed by a space and then the local IP address of the host. Hit Enter.

4. That's it! You can use a free VPN service like Hamachi to play with people who are not already on your same local network.
